column2: Wooden Handle Cheese Knife Set (Set A) (4pcs)
column3: Cutting Firm Cheese: A cheese knife is commonly used to cut firm cheeses, such as Cheddar, Gouda, or Parmesan. Its sharp edge and narrow blade allow for clean and precise cuts, enabling you to slice through the cheese without crushing or crumbling it.Slicing Semi-Soft Cheese: The sharp blade of a cheese knife is suitable for slicing semi-soft cheeses, like Brie, Camembert, or Havarti. Its narrow and pointed shape enables smooth, controlled cuts, resulting in neat slices.Spreading Soft Cheese: Some cheese knives have a broader, rounded tip that can be used for spreading soft or creamy cheeses, such as goat cheese or cream cheese. The wider blade allows for effortless spreading on crackers, bread, or bagels.Serving Cheese: Cheese knives are designed not only for cutting but also for serving cheese. The thin, pointed blade helps lift and transfer slices of cheese from the cutting board to a serving plate or cheese board.Pairing with Wine: Cheese knives are often used during cheese tastings or wine and cheese pairings. The specialized design of the knife enhances the presentation and allows for precise cutting and serving, enhancing the overall cheese tasting experience.

Featuring a 220gsm flannel outer layer with an ultra-soft hand feeling and a 260gsm Sherpa inner lining that adds extra warmth, this wearable blanket is the perfect way to stay warm and cozy during cold weather. In addition to keeping your arms and shoulders covered, this hooded blanket with arm sleeves keeps your hands free and doesn't slip off when you walk or move, so you can wear it not only at home while watching TV, reading or learning, but also outside when walking your pets, camping, or travelling. A stretchy cuff prevents cold air from entering the cuff and allows you to adjust it to any part of your arms, and a big plush hood keeps your head, ears, neck always warm. Moreover, two front pockets allow you to store your phone, remote, or just simply warm up your hands. This oversized blanket hoodie is unisex-designed and comes in several solid colors. As it's suitable for men and women, it is also an ideal gift choice for birthdays, anniversaries, mothers' days, father's days, or Christmas. The hoodie blanket is designed for everyday use, so it’s quite easy to care for - machine wash with cold water separately on gentle cycle, tumble dry on low heat, no ironing required.

Your kids will stay warm and cozy the fun way with Huggle Pets Hoodie! Huggle Pets Hoodie is the fun, new pet thats also a super warm and soft hoodie! It stores as a pet but opens up to an ultra-soft and super warm oversized hoodie! The pet folds magically into the hood and zips securely inside! Perfect for when your kids are playing outside or lounging around the house. Huggle Pets Hoodie is one size fits all, so its great for kids of any age! Huggle Pets Hoodie comes in a variety of different friends to choose from and each with their own unique personality! Theres a cuddly penguin, a brave tiger, a loveable unicorn, a playful puppy, a pretty kitty and many more pals to choose from! Collect them all! Huggle Pets Hoodie goes with your kids everywhere! Keep your kids cuddly warm with their very own Huggle Pets Hoodie!

Approximately 80cm from shoulder till lowest point and 108 cm from top of hoodie till lowest point. Escape the cold with the ultra plush blanket hoodie, Huggle Hoodie!Made of ultra soft wool and lined with Ultimate Warming comfort! Hoodie is one size for everyone to keep you cosy and warm from head to toe! It is reversible so you can choose your favourite look. Even a large and spacious pocket to keep what you need in your hand! Most comfortable oversized hoodie that combines the warmth of a cosy blanket with the comfort of your favourite hoodie. Specifications: Material: polyester fabric Size: one size The Huggle Hoodie is the most comfortable oversized hooded sweatshirt that keeps you totally snug and warm from head to toe. Made for the softest, most luxurious blanket fabric and lined with the ultimate in warming, comfort.The amazingly comfortable Huggle Hoodie combines the warmth of a cozy blanket with the comfort of your favourite hoodie. It’s made of ultra-soft fleece on the outside and plush Sherpa material on the inside. Generously sized to keep you warm from head to toe. Features an extra large hood to keep your head warm and snug and a big, roomy pocket to keep what you need right at hand. It’s even reversible!!

column2: Hot Water Bottles with Soft Dot Design
column3: Available colour will be supplied. Pour boiling hot water in the bottle and it will keep you warm and cozy
